direct_entity.title: Direct Entity
direct_entity.description: The entity that was the direct cause of the damage.

source_entity.title: Source Entity
source_entity.description: Checks the entity that was the source of the damage (for example: The skeleton that shot the arrow).

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: An array of objects containing damage type tags that the type of the damage should be included in.

id.title: ID
id.description: The resource location of the tag.

expected.title: Expected
expected.description: Whether this tag should be present on the damage type.
